name: Kalvalax

skills.name: Oozing Greatsword
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. 40% chance to increase duration of all [Poison] debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Heals this Champion by 2.5% of their MAX HP for each [Poison] debuff on the target.

effects.notes: 40% chance to extend all Poison debuffs by 1 turn.
Heals 2.5% MAX HP per Poison debuff on target.

skills.notes: Excellent for keeping poisons up and self-sustain.

skills.name: Corruption Locus
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places an extra hit for each [Poison] debuff on the target (up to 3 extra hits).

effects.notes: Base hit + up to 3 extra hits for each Poison debuff.

skills.name: Storm of Vitriol
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage increases according to the number of [Poison] debuffs on each target.

effects.notes: +1% ENEMY MAX HP per Poison debuff on each target.

skills.notes: Extremely high damage with many Poisons on enemies.

skills.name: Pestilence
skills.description: Places four 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns at the start of each round. 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn at the start of each turn. [Active Effect] Whenever an enemy places a [Poison] debuff on this Champion, instantly removes it and replaces it with a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 2 turns instead.

effects.notes: Places four 5% Poison debuffs for 2 turns at start of round.
50% chance to place 5% Poison for 1 turn at start of each turn.
Replaces Poison with 15% Continuous Heal for 2 turns.

skills.notes: Unique passive for mass Poison and self-sustain.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 19%.
forms.comments: Kalvalax is a top-tier Poison exploder and damage dealer for Clan Boss, dungeons, and Hydra. His passive enables fast Poison setup and strong self-sustain.

general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: GIANT SLAYER (A2 'Serpent Fang' attacks 1 enemy with extra hits for each Poison debuff - 1 base hit + up to 3 extra hits = 1-4 total hits. 30% proc per hit = up to ~76% total proc chance with 3 Poison debuffs. Scales with Poison count for massive MAX HP damage). Warmaster is SUBOPTIMAL for Kalvalax (A2 multi-hit benefits more from Giant Slayer). NOTE: Arena can use Helmsmasher for burst damage if not using Poison setup.

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends Poison from 2→3 turns. A1 extends Poison duration by 1 turn on 40% chance, 60% booked. A2 scales damage with Poison count. A3 damage scales with Poison count. Passive places 2x Poison on self-damage. Master Hexer extends all Poison for 50% more damage + more A2 hits), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Poison consistency - need 250+ ACC Clan Boss/Doom Tower).

KEY MASTERIES: Giant Slayer (A2 multi-hit - scales with Poison count), Master Hexer (CRITICAL - entire kit scales with Poison, extends 2→3 turns), Eagle Eye (ACC for Poison), Swarm Smiter (A2 multi-hit synergy), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling).

SYNERGIES: A2 'Serpent Fang' multi-hit mechanic (1 base hit + up to 3 extra hits for each Poison debuff = 1-4 total hits) synergizes with Giant Slayer (30% proc per hit). A1 extends Poison duration by 1 turn (40% base, 60% booked) + heals 2.5% MAX HP per Poison debuff. A3 AoE damage scales with Poison count. Passive places 2x Poison debuffs on ally taking fatal hit (50% chance, saves ally + sets up A2 multi-hit). Master Hexer extends ALL Poison from 2→3 turns for 50% more damage + more consistent A2 multi-hit. Build for 250+ ACC (with Eagle Eye), 200+ SPD, HP%/DEF% for survivability.

UNIQUE MECHANICS: A2 hit count scales with Poison debuffs on target (1-4 hits total). More Poison = more hits = more Giant Slayer procs. A1/A3 damage scales with Poison count. Passive saves ally from fatal hit by placing 2x Poison on them (cheese synergy for ally survival + A2 setup). Entire kit revolves around Poison stacking.

POISON SYNERGY: Kalvalax needs Poison support (Frozen Banshee, Elenaril, Narma, etc.) to maximize A2 multi-hit damage. Without Poison setup, A2 is only 1-hit (Giant Slayer still works but not optimal). Master Hexer extends Poison duration for sustained multi-hit damage.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI will always open with A3 if available, which is optimal for most content.

mechanics_advisory: Best used in Poison-heavy teams. Passive enables fast setup for Poison explosion and strong self-sustain.
